participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, with a passion for music and learning.
participant_1.background: I am prone to spending hours researching random topics online. Music has always been my number one passion. I would buy a mobile for my baby's nursery. We are getting married in a park. I would love to learn how to make my own clothes.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and playful, with a love for nature and a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I don't care what the weather is as long as I get to wear my pink hiking boots. I like going to the movies. I am a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters. I love to grow sunflowers. I am a genius and know over 300 languages.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
Pretty good! I'm just getting ready for my wedding in the park next month.
How exciting! That sounds really lovely.
Thanks! I'm a little nervous, but mostly excited.
That's understandable. But I'm sure it will be a beautiful day and a wonderful time.
I hope so! I love music and I'm going to have a string quartet play.
That sounds beautiful! I love string quartets.
I think it's going to be perfect.
I'm sure it will be. I'm excited to hear all about it.
I will definitely keep you updated!
Great! I hope you have a wonderful day.
